Class sTestHipChatFactory

  • public class sTestHipChatFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class Demonstrates oTestHipChatFactory().
    This class factory is used to access HipChat and send AT messages to any team

        userID - - user name assigned to the room

        This method Demonstrates sendMessage().
        This method is used to send a generic message with the color purple.
        Parameters:
        roomID - - ID of the room, not the room name.
        userID - - The id of the person that is in the room.
        name - - Full name of the userID

        You must call configureHipChat before this call.
        Parameters:
        message - - text message. You can use
        room - - room to send the message to
